CatDescriptText: Selected headlines in this edition read, "State HR Commission Favored At Stormy Pittsburgh Session", Mrs. Robert L. Vann, William G. Nunn in Pa Hall of Fame" and "Seven Blacks Attend GOP Womens' Meet".
TitMainTitle: Copy of front page of October 13, 1973 edition of New Pittsburgh Courier
